pages.text: aur andha aur aankho waala baraabar nahi
aur zinde aur murde baraabar nahi ho sakte, Allah ta’ala jis ko chaahta hai suna deta hai aur aap un logo ko nahi suna sakte jo qabro mein hai
aap to sirf daraane waale hai
hum ne hee aap ko haq de kar khush qabri sunaane waala aur dar sunaane waala bana kar bheja hai aur koyi ummath aisi nahi hoyi, jis mein koyi dar sunaane waala na guzra ho
aur agar ye log aap ko jhutla de, to jo log un se pehle ho guzre hai unhone bhi jhutlaaya tha, un ke paas bhi un ke paighambar maujize aur sahife aur roushan kitaabe le kar aaye thein
phir main ne un kaafiro ko pakad liya, so mera azaab kaisa hoa

kya aap ne us baath par nazar nahi ki ke Allah ta’ala ne asmaan se paani utaara, phir hum ne us ke zariye se muqtalif rangato ke phal nikaale aur pahaado ke muqtalif hisse hai, safedh aur surkh, ke un ki bhi rangate muqtalif hai aur bahuth gehre siyaah

aur isi tarah aadmiyo aur jaanwaro aur chau paayo mein bhi baaz aise hai, ke un ki rangate muqtalif hai, Allah se us ke wahi bandhe darte hai, jo ilm rakhte hai, waaqeyi Allah ta’ala zabardasth bada baqshne waala hai

jo log kitaabullah ki tilaawath karte hai aur namaaz ki paabandi rakhte hai, aur jo kuch hum ne un ko ata farmaya hai, us mein se poshida aur elaaniya qarch karte hai, wo aisi tijaarath ke ummid waar hai jo kabhi qasaare mein na hogi
ta ke un ko un ki ujrate puri de aur un ko apne fazl se aur zyaada de, beshak wo bada baqshne waala qadardaan hai
